{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"概要","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"牛野ダムキャンプ。","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-2","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"\n牛野ダムキャンプの利用に関する要点","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.village.ohira.miyagi.jp/ques/questionnaire.php?openid=6&check"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"宮城県/大衡村ホームページ/牛野ダムキャンプの利用届出について","marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-3","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"キャンプ前","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"ordered-list","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"事前に「公園施設利用届」の届出が必要。","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"上記のリンクから入力。","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"届出確認時間：平日の","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"8:30～16:00。","marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"届出への返信は行わない。","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"予告なくキャンプ場を閉園することがある。","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"12月中旬に積雪予想。閉園の可能性あり。","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"問い合わせフォームには60分の時間制限あり。ブラウザはクッキー(Cookie)を使用。事前にメモ帳やワードなどで文章を作成してから問合せフォームに貼り付けること。","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]},{"nodeType":"heading-3","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"キャンプ中","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"ordered-list","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"入退場時間：9:00～17:00。","marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"宮城県でクマ出没注意報。クマなどに注意が必要。","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"園内に防犯カメラ設置。悪質な行為は警察に通報。","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"ゴミや燃えカスは持ち帰り必須。公園内に灰捨て場なし。","marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"直火焚き禁止。バーベキューコンロや焚き火台使用を。","marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"キャンプサイトや共用部分は譲り合って利用。","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"陸上自衛隊の王城寺原演習場と隣接。立ち入り禁止。","marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"湖面利用は自由だが、ライフジャケット着用","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"推奨","marks":[{"type":"underline"},{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"。事故は自己責任。","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"水質事故の場合、原因者が損害賠償や事故処理費用を負担。","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"騒音や大声等、他者迷惑行為禁止。","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"樹木の枝伐採や草花の採取禁止。","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"ペット同伴可。放し飼い不可。","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"施設の閉鎖の際は連絡あり。","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"クマやハチにも注意が必要。","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"フリーサイト使用。チェックイン・アウト時間なし。","marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"data":{}}]}]}]},{"nodeType":"hr","data":{},"content":[]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}
